item.title: Remko Duursma - All Publications
item.description: My complete list of peer-reviewed scientific articles (2003-2017). Broughton, K.J., Smith, R.A., Duursma, R.A., Tan, D.K., Payton, P., Bange, M.P., Tissue, D.T. 2017. Warming alters the positive impact of elevated CO~2~ concentration on cotton growth and physiology during soil water deficit. Functional Plant Biology, 44, 267-278 . Duursma, R., Choat, B. 2017. fitplc - an R package to fit hydraulic vulnerability curves. Journal of Plant Hydraulics, 4, 002 .
